entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then clearing. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
